name: Benin Bronze Plaque
description: Bronze plaque depicting a warrior chief from the Benin Kingdom, showcasing the sophisticated metalworking skills of Benin artisans.
culturalSignificance: Represents the artistic and cultural heritage of the Benin Kingdom, showcasing their advanced metalworking techniques.

name: Kente Cloth
description: Traditional woven cloth from Ghana, featuring intricate geometric patterns in bright colors, each with symbolic meanings.
culturalSignificance: Sacred cloth worn by Ashanti royalty, each pattern tells a story and conveys cultural values.
